# Next.js contact chronicle project setup (2025-12-06 22:24Z)

_**User (2025-12-06 22:24Z)**_

You are an expert Next.js + TypeScript + Tailwind CSS engineer.

You need to build a next.js application for a personal project on Contact Chronicle

I will supply you with the next instruction immediately after your confirmation. 

##Background:

-	The web application allows you to upload your historic contact information from LinkedIn, Google, or other sources and build a historic view that allows you to quickly find contacts based on a timeline of key historic moments in your personal and professional life. 

-	You will play the role of a full-stack developer. You will take guidance from me in building the application step by step. I will offer target goals, and you will create and enact a plan to achieve this goal.

##Coding preferences:

-	We will be using Next.js, Reach, Tailwind, and Vercel for this application.

-	Later we will use Supabase for the database. 

##Overall layout

-	The application will contain three mobile responsive pages

-	Page1 - You define your life/career timeline (important moments).

-	Page2 - You upload your contacts exported from LinkedIn / Google / etc.

-	Page3 - The app shows charts & tables of contact over time, so you can see who you met around which life events and quickly search them.

-	A simple top navigation bar that appears on all pages with:

o	Logo (attached an image to be used as logo)

o	My Timeline

o	Upload Contacts

o	View Chronicle

-	Use Tailwind for styling with a clean, dashboard-like feel (cards, subtle borders, light gray background).

##Color Scheme

-	Keep the color palette in the combination of B7E5CD, 8ABEB9, 305669, C1785A

-	Add Tailwind utility classes for spacing, typography, and card styling 



##Footer

-	The footer must have the text “Week1 Sprint @Overclock Accelerator” at the center.



## Page 1: “My Timeline” 

-	This page is for building a structured life and career timeline.

-	Page title: “Build Your Personal Timeline”

-	Under the title, a short description like:

o	“Add key professional, personal, and geographic milestones across your life and career.”

-	A table-like UI with columns:

o	Month / Year (e.g. 09/2025)

o	Key Professional Event

o	Key Personal Event

o	Key Geographic Event

-	Implement this as an editable list of rows using local React state:

o	Each row has inputs for:

	Month/Year (simple text or date input for now)

	Professional event (text input)

	Personal event (text input)

	Geographic event (text input)

-	Provide buttons in Add, Edit, Delete Panel:

o	“Add Row” – appends a blank row.

o	Per row: Edit and Delete (edit mode can just be always-on inputs for now; Delete removes the row).

-	A primary button at the bottom: “Confirm Timeline”

o	For now, just log the timeline data to the console

o	I will give instructions to connect this to Supabase database later. 

-	Use a simple card container around the table (rounded corners, border, padding).





##Page 2: “Upload Contacts”

-	This page represents the data import step for contacts from LinkedIn / Google / etc.

-	Page title: “Upload Contacts”

-	Subtext that explains: “Upload your exported contacts (CSV) from LinkedIn, Google, or other sources.”

-	Layout sections:

o	Drag-and-drop area:

	A bordered, dashed box with text:

•	“Drag and Drop CSV File Here

o	Expected Columns Info:

	A small card or panel listing expected columns:

	First Name, Last Name

	Email Address, Phone Number

	LinkedIn Profile

	Date Added, Date Edited

	Source (LinkedIn, Google, etc.)

o	Preview Table:

	After a file is selected, show the first ~5–10 rows in a table for preview.

	Include columns like:

	First Name, Last Name, Email, Phone Number, LinkedIn Profile.

-	Buttons at the bottom:

o	“Confirm” – for now, just logs parsed data to the console. I will later give instructions to connect this to supabase database.  

o	“Cancel” – clears the file and preview state.

##Page 3: “View Chronicle” 

-	This page ties everything together to show analytics and search over connections.

-	Page title: “View Chronicle”

-	At the top, show a Connections Dashboard with four summary cards:

o	Total Connections (number)

o	Avg / Month

o	Peak Month (e.g. “2022-11 (189)”)

o	High-Activity Months %

-	For now, you can compute these metrics from mock data defined in the frontend 

-	Under the cards, add a bar chart placeholder section:

o	Title: “Contacts Added by Month (Last 5 Years)”

o	Implement this as either:

	A simple custom SVG bar chart, OR

	A div-based representation (bars with varying heights using Tailwind inline styles).

o	X-axis conceptual labels: Month/Year; Y-axis: Count of contacts.

-	Next to or below the chart, add a Filter Panel box:

o	Title: “Filter Panel”

o	Include simple filter controls (they don’t have to be fully wired up yet):

	Date range (start / end inputs)

	Event type dropdown: All, Professional, Personal, Geographic

	Source dropdown: All, LinkedIn, Google, Facebook, etc.

-	At the bottom, add a Contacts Table section:

o	Title: “Contacts”

o	Columns:

	Name

	Company (or placeholder)

	Role (or placeholder)

	Date Added

	Source

	Notes

o	Include:

	A search input above the table that filters rows by name.

	A simple text area or button per row to “Add Note” (store notes in local state for now).

+ 'use client';
+ 
+ import { useState } from 'react';
+ 
+ interface TimelineRow {
+   id: string;
+   monthYear: string;
+   professionalEvent: string;
+   personalEvent: string;
+   geographicEvent: string;
+ }
+ 
+ export default function MyTimelinePage() {
+   const [timelineRows, setTimelineRows] = useState&lt;TimelineRow[]&gt;([
+     { id: '1', monthYear: '', professionalEvent: '', personalEvent: '', geographicEvent: '' },
+   ]);
+ 
+   const addRow = () =&gt; {
+     const newRow: TimelineRow = {
+       id: Date.now().toString(),
+       monthYear: '',
+       professionalEvent: '',
+       personalEvent: '',
+       geographicEvent: '',
+     };
+     setTimelineRows([...timelineRows, newRow]);
+   };
+ 
+   const deleteRow = (id: string) =&gt; {
+     if (timelineRows.length &gt; 1) {
+       setTimelineRows(timelineRows.filter((row) =&gt; row.id !== id));
+     }
+   };
+ 
+   const updateRow = (id: string, field: keyof TimelineRow, value: string) =&gt; {
+     setTimelineRows(
+       timelineRows.map((row) =&gt;
+         row.id === id ? { ...row, [field]: value } : row
+       )
+     );
+   };
+ 
+   const handleConfirm = () =&gt; {
+     console.log('Timeline Data:', timelineRows);
+     alert('Timeline data logged to console. Check browser console for details.');
+   };
+ 
+   return (
+     &lt;div className="max-w-7xl mx-auto px-4 sm:px-6 lg:px-8 py-8"&gt;
+       &lt;div className="mb-6"&gt;
+         &lt;h1 className="text-3xl font-bold text-[#305669] mb-2"&gt;
+           Build Your Personal Timeline
+         &lt;/h1&gt;
+         &lt;p className="text-gray-600"&gt;
+           Add key professional, personal, and geographic milestones across your life and career.
+         &lt;/p&gt;
+       &lt;/div&gt;
+ 
+       &lt;div className="bg-white rounded-lg border border-gray-200 shadow-sm p-6"&gt;
+         &lt;div className="overflow-x-auto"&gt;
+           &lt;table className="w-full"&gt;
+             &lt;thead&gt;
+               &lt;tr className="border-b border-gray-200"&gt;
+                 &lt;th className="text-left py-3 px-4 font-semibold text-[#305669]"&gt;Month / Year&lt;/th&gt;
+                 &lt;th className="text-left py-3 px-4 font-semibold text-[#305669]"&gt;Key Professional Event&lt;/th&gt;
+                 &lt;th className="text-left py-3 px-4 font-semibold text-[#305669]"&gt;Key Personal Event&lt;/th&gt;
+                 &lt;th className="text-left py-3 px-4 font-semibold text-[#305669]"&gt;Key Geographic Event&lt;/th&gt;
+                 &lt;th className="text-left py-3 px-4 font-semibold text-[#305669]"&gt;Actions&lt;/th&gt;
+               &lt;/tr&gt;
+             &lt;/thead&gt;
+             &lt;tbody&gt;
+               {timelineRows.map((row) =&gt; (
+                 &lt;tr key={row.id} className="border-b border-gray-100 hover:bg-gray-50"&gt;
+                   &lt;td className="py-3 px-4"&gt;
+                     &lt;input
+                       type="text"
+                       placeholder="09/2025"
+                       value={row.monthYear}
+                       onChange={(e) =&gt; updateRow(row.id, 'monthYear', e.target.value)}
+                       className="w-full px-3 py-2 border border-gray-300 rounded-md focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-[#8ABEB9] focus:border-transparent"
+                     /&gt;
+                   &lt;/td&gt;
+                   &lt;td className="py-3 px-4"&gt;
+                     &lt;input
+                       type="text"
+                       placeholder="e.g. Started Work at IBM"
+                       value={row.professionalEvent}
+                       onChange={(e) =&gt; updateRow(row.id, 'professionalEvent', e.target.value)}
+                       className="w-full px-3 py-2 border border-gray-300 rounded-md focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-[#8ABEB9] focus:border-transparent"
+                     /&gt;
+                   &lt;/td&gt;
+                   &lt;td className="py-3 px-4"&gt;
+                     &lt;input
+                       type="text"
+                       placeholder="e.g. Had a baby"
+                       value={row.personalEvent}
+                       onChange={(e) =&gt; updateRow(row.id, 'personalEvent', e.target.value)}
+                       className="w-full px-3 py-2 border border-gray-300 rounded-md focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-[#8ABEB9] focus:border-transparent"
+                     /&gt;
+                   &lt;/td&gt;
+                   &lt;td className="py-3 px-4"&gt;
+                     &lt;input
+                       type="text"
+                       placeholder="e.g. Moved to Newark"
+                       value={row.geographicEvent}
+                       onChange={(e) =&gt; updateRow(row.id, 'geographicEvent', e.target.value)}
+                       className="w-full px-3 py-2 border border-gray-300 rounded-md focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-[#8ABEB9] focus:border-transparent"
+                     /&gt;
+                   &lt;/td&gt;
+                   &lt;td className="py-3 px-4"&gt;
+                     &lt;button
+                       onClick={() =&gt; deleteRow(row.id)}
+                       disabled={timelineRows.length === 1}
+                       className="px-3 py-1 bg-red-100 text-red-700 rounded-md hover:bg-red-200 disabled:opacity-50 disabled:cursor-not-allowed text-sm"
+                     &gt;
+                       Delete
+                     &lt;/button&gt;
+                   &lt;/td&gt;
+                 &lt;/tr&gt;
+               ))}
+             &lt;/tbody&gt;
+           &lt;/table&gt;
+         &lt;/div&gt;
+ 
+         &lt;div className="mt-6 flex flex-wrap gap-3"&gt;
+           &lt;button
+             onClick={addRow}
+             className="px-4 py-2 bg-[#8ABEB9] text-white rounded-md hover:bg-[#7aada8] transition-colors"
+           &gt;
+             Add Row
+           &lt;/button&gt;
+         &lt;/div&gt;
+ 
+         &lt;div className="mt-8 pt-6 border-t border-gray-200"&gt;
+           &lt;button
+             onClick={handleConfirm}
+             className="px-6 py-3 bg-[#305669] text-white rounded-md hover:bg-[#244a5a] transition-colors font-semibold"
+           &gt;
+             Confirm Timeline
+           &lt;/button&gt;
+         &lt;/div&gt;
+       &lt;/div&gt;
+     &lt;/div&gt;
+   );
+ }
+

+ 'use client';
+ 
+ import { useState, useRef } from 'react';
+ 
+ interface Contact {
+   firstName?: string;
+   lastName?: string;
+   email?: string;
+   phone?: string;
+   linkedIn?: string;
+   dateAdded?: string;
+   dateEdited?: string;
+   source?: string;
+ }
+ 
+ export default function UploadContactsPage() {
+   const [file, setFile] = useState&lt;File | null&gt;(null);
+   const [previewData, setPreviewData] = useState&lt;Contact[]&gt;([]);
+   const [isDragging, setIsDragging] = useState(false);
+   const fileInputRef = useRef&lt;HTMLInputElement&gt;(null);
+ 
+   const parseCSV = (text: string): Contact[] =&gt; {
+     const lines = text.split('\n').filter((line) =&gt; line.trim());
+     if (lines.length === 0) return [];
+ 
+     const headers = lines[0].split(',').map((h) =&gt; h.trim().toLowerCase());
+     const data: Contact[] = [];
+ 
+     for (let i = 1; i &lt; Math.min(lines.length, 11); i++) {
+       const values = lines[i].split(',').map((v) =&gt; v.trim());
+       const contact: Contact = {};
+       headers.forEach((header, index) =&gt; {
+         const value = values[index] || '';
+         if (header.includes('first') &amp;&amp; header.includes('name')) {
+           contact.firstName = value;
+         } else if (header.includes('last') &amp;&amp; header.includes('name')) {
+           contact.lastName = value;
+         } else if (header.includes('email')) {
+           contact.email = value;
+         } else if (header.includes('phone')) {
+           contact.phone = value;
+         } else if (header.includes('linkedin')) {
+           contact.linkedIn = value;
+         } else if (header.includes('date') &amp;&amp; header.includes('added')) {
+           contact.dateAdded = value;
+         } else if (header.includes('date') &amp;&amp; header.includes('edited')) {
+           contact.dateEdited = value;
+         } else if (header.includes('source')) {
+           contact.source = value;
+         }
+       });
+       data.push(contact);
+     }
+ 
+     return data;
+   };
+ 
+   const handleFileSelect = (selectedFile: File) =&gt; {
+     if (selectedFile &amp;&amp; selectedFile.type === 'text/csv') {
+       setFile(selectedFile);
+       const reader = new FileReader();
+       reader.onload = (e) =&gt; {
+         const text = e.target?.result as string;
+         const parsed = parseCSV(text);
+         setPreviewData(parsed);
+       };
+       reader.readAsText(selectedFile);
+     } else {
+       alert('Please upload a CSV file');
+     }
+   };
+ 
+   const handleDragOver = (e: React.DragEvent) =&gt; {
+     e.preventDefault();
+     setIsDragging(true);
+   };
+ 
+   const handleDragLeave = () =&gt; {
+     setIsDragging(false);
+   };
+ 
+   const handleDrop = (e: React.DragEvent) =&gt; {
+     e.preventDefault();
+     setIsDragging(false);
+     const droppedFile = e.dataTransfer.files[0];
+     if (droppedFile) {
+       handleFileSelect(droppedFile);
+     }
+   };
+ 
+   const handleFileInput = (e: React.ChangeEvent&lt;HTMLInputElement&gt;) =&gt; {
+     const selectedFile = e.target.files?.[0];
+     if (selectedFile) {
+       handleFileSelect(selectedFile);
+     }
+   };
+ 
+   const handleConfirm = () =&gt; {
+     console.log('Contacts Data:', previewData);
+     alert('Contacts data logged to console. Check browser console for details.');
+   };
+ 
+   const handleCancel = () =&gt; {
+     setFile(null);
+     setPreviewData([]);
+     if (fileInputRef.current) {
+       fileInputRef.current.value = '';
+     }
+   };
+ 
+   return (
+     &lt;div className="max-w-7xl mx-auto px-4 sm:px-6 lg:px-8 py-8"&gt;
+       &lt;div className="mb-6"&gt;
+         &lt;h1 className="text-3xl font-bold text-[#305669] mb-2"&gt;
+           Upload Contacts
+         &lt;/h1&gt;
+         &lt;p className="text-gray-600"&gt;
+           Upload your exported contacts (CSV) from LinkedIn, Google, or other sources.
+         &lt;/p&gt;
+       &lt;/div&gt;
+ 
+       &lt;div className="space-y-6"&gt;
+         {/* Drag and Drop Area */}
+         &lt;div className="bg-white rounded-lg border border-gray-200 shadow-sm p-6"&gt;
+           &lt;div
+             onDragOver={handleDragOver}
+             onDragLeave={handleDragLeave}
+             onDrop={handleDrop}
+             className={&#96;border-2 border-dashed rounded-lg p-12 text-center transition-colors ${
+               isDragging
+                 ? 'border-[#8ABEB9] bg-[#B7E5CD]'
+                 : 'border-gray-300 bg-gray-50'
+             }&#96;}
+           &gt;
+             &lt;input
+               ref={fileInputRef}
+               type="file"
+               accept=".csv"
+               onChange={handleFileInput}
+               className="hidden"
+               id="file-upload"
+             /&gt;
+             &lt;label
+               htmlFor="file-upload"
+               className="cursor-pointer block"
+             &gt;
+               &lt;p className="text-lg font-medium text-gray-700 mb-2"&gt;
+                 Drag and Drop CSV File Here
+               &lt;/p&gt;
+               &lt;p className="text-sm text-gray-500"&gt;
+                 or click to browse
+               &lt;/p&gt;
+             &lt;/label&gt;
+             {file &amp;&amp; (
+               &lt;p className="mt-4 text-sm text-[#305669] font-medium"&gt;
+                 Selected: {file.name}
+               &lt;/p&gt;
+             )}
+           &lt;/div&gt;
+         &lt;/div&gt;
+ 
+         {/* Expected Columns Info */}
+         &lt;div className="bg-white rounded-lg border border-gray-200 shadow-sm p-6"&gt;
+           &lt;h2 className="text-lg font-semibold text-[#305669] mb-4"&gt;
+             Expected Columns:
+           &lt;/h2&gt;
+           &lt;div className="grid grid-cols-2 md:grid-cols-3 gap-2 text-sm text-gray-700"&gt;
+             &lt;div&gt;• First Name&lt;/div&gt;
+             &lt;div&gt;• Last Name&lt;/div&gt;
+             &lt;div&gt;• Email Address&lt;/div&gt;
+             &lt;div&gt;• Phone Number&lt;/div&gt;
+             &lt;div&gt;• LinkedIn Profile&lt;/div&gt;
+             &lt;div&gt;• Date Added&lt;/div&gt;
+             &lt;div&gt;• Date Edited&lt;/div&gt;
+             &lt;div&gt;• Source (LinkedIn, Google, etc.)&lt;/div&gt;
+           &lt;/div&gt;
+         &lt;/div&gt;
+ 
+         {/* Preview Table */}
+         {previewData.length &gt; 0 &amp;&amp; (
+           &lt;div className="bg-white rounded-lg border border-gray-200 shadow-sm p-6"&gt;
+             &lt;h2 className="text-lg font-semibold text-[#305669] mb-4"&gt;
+               Preview Records
+             &lt;/h2&gt;
+             &lt;p className="text-sm text-gray-600 mb-4"&gt;
+               Table View of the Data Uploaded
+             &lt;/p&gt;
+             &lt;div className="overflow-x-auto"&gt;
+               &lt;table className="w-full"&gt;
+                 &lt;thead&gt;
+                   &lt;tr className="border-b border-gray-200"&gt;
+                     &lt;th className="text-left py-2 px-4 font-semibold text-[#305669] text-sm"&gt;First Name&lt;/th&gt;
+                     &lt;th className="text-left py-2 px-4 font-semibold text-[#305669] text-sm"&gt;Last Name&lt;/th&gt;
+                     &lt;th className="text-left py-2 px-4 font-semibold text-[#305669] text-sm"&gt;Email&lt;/th&gt;
+                     &lt;th className="text-left py-2 px-4 font-semibold text-[#305669] text-sm"&gt;Phone&lt;/th&gt;
+                     &lt;th className="text-left py-2 px-4 font-semibold text-[#305669] text-sm"&gt;LinkedIn&lt;/th&gt;
+                   &lt;/tr&gt;
+                 &lt;/thead&gt;
+                 &lt;tbody&gt;
+                   {previewData.map((contact, index) =&gt; (
+                     &lt;tr key={index} className="border-b border-gray-100 hover:bg-gray-50"&gt;
+                       &lt;td className="py-2 px-4 text-sm"&gt;{contact.firstName || '-'}&lt;/td&gt;
+                       &lt;td className="py-2 px-4 text-sm"&gt;{contact.lastName || '-'}&lt;/td&gt;
+                       &lt;td className="py-2 px-4 text-sm"&gt;{contact.email || '-'}&lt;/td&gt;
+                       &lt;td className="py-2 px-4 text-sm"&gt;{contact.phone || '-'}&lt;/td&gt;
+                       &lt;td className="py-2 px-4 text-sm"&gt;{contact.linkedIn || '-'}&lt;/td&gt;
+                     &lt;/tr&gt;
+                   ))}
+                 &lt;/tbody&gt;
+               &lt;/table&gt;
+             &lt;/div&gt;
+           &lt;/div&gt;
+         )}
+ 
+         {/* Action Buttons */}
+         &lt;div className="flex gap-4"&gt;
+           &lt;button
+             onClick={handleConfirm}
+             disabled={previewData.length === 0}
+             className="px-6 py-3 bg-[#305669] text-white rounded-md hover:bg-[#244a5a] transition-colors font-semibold disabled:opacity-50 disabled:cursor-not-allowed"
+           &gt;
+             Confirm
+           &lt;/button&gt;
+           &lt;button
+             onClick={handleCancel}
+             className="px-6 py-3 bg-gray-200 text-gray-700 rounded-md hover:bg-gray-300 transition-colors font-semibold"
+           &gt;
+             Cancel
+           &lt;/button&gt;
+         &lt;/div&gt;
+       &lt;/div&gt;
+     &lt;/div&gt;
+   );
+ }
+ 
```

</details>

</tool-use>

+ export default function ViewChroniclePage() {
+   const [contacts] = useState&lt;Contact[]&gt;(mockContacts);
+   const [searchQuery, setSearchQuery] = useState('');
+   const [notes, setNotes] = useState&lt;Record&lt;string, string&gt;&gt;({});
+   const [dateRangeStart, setDateRangeStart] = useState('');
+   const [dateRangeEnd, setDateRangeEnd] = useState('');
+   const [eventType, setEventType] = useState('All');
+   const [source, setSource] = useState('All');
+ 
+   // Calculate metrics
+   const metrics = useMemo(() =&gt; {
+     const totalContacts = mockMonthlyData.reduce((sum, item) =&gt; sum + item.count, 0);
+     const avgPerMonth = totalContacts / mockMonthlyData.length;
+     const peakMonth = mockMonthlyData.reduce((max, item) =&gt; 
+       item.count &gt; max.count ? item : max, mockMonthlyData[0]
+     );
+     const meanVolume = avgPerMonth;
+     const highActivityMonths = mockMonthlyData.filter(item =&gt; item.count &gt; meanVolume).length;
+     const highActivityPercent = Math.round((highActivityMonths / mockMonthlyData.length) * 100);
+ 
+     return {
+       totalContacts,
+       avgPerMonth: avgPerMonth.toFixed(1),
+       peakMonth: &#96;${peakMonth.month} (${peakMonth.count})&#96;,
+       highActivityPercent,
+     };
+   }, []);
+ 
+   // Filter contacts
+   const filteredContacts = useMemo(() =&gt; {
+     return contacts.filter((contact) =&gt; {
+       const matchesSearch = contact.name.toLowerCase().includes(searchQuery.toLowerCase());
+       const matchesSource = source === 'All' || contact.source === source;
+       // Date filtering would go here when implemented
+       return matchesSearch &amp;&amp; matchesSource;
+     });
+   }, [contacts, searchQuery, source]);
+ 
+   const maxCount = Math.max(...mockMonthlyData.map(d =&gt; d.count));
+ 
+   const updateNote = (contactId: string, note: string) =&gt; {
+     setNotes({ ...notes, [contactId]: note });
+   };
+ 
+   return (
+     &lt;div className="max-w-7xl mx-auto px-4 sm:px-6 lg:px-8 py-8"&gt;
+       &lt;div className="mb-6"&gt;
+         &lt;h1 className="text-3xl font-bold text-[#305669] mb-2"&gt;
+           View Chronicle
+         &lt;/h1&gt;

+             &lt;span className="text-xs text-gray-500"&gt;Last 5 Years&lt;/span&gt;
+           &lt;/div&gt;
+           &lt;p className="text-3xl font-bold text-[#305669]"&gt;{metrics.totalContacts.toLocaleString()}&lt;/p&gt;
+           &lt;p className="text-xs text-gray-500 mt-1"&gt;over across all months&lt;/p&gt;
+         &lt;/div&gt;

+         &lt;/div&gt;

+           Contacts Added by Month (Last 5 Years)

+             &lt;p className="text-sm text-gray-600"&gt;X-axis: Month (MM-YY)&lt;/p&gt;
+             &lt;p className="text-sm text-gray-600"&gt;Y-axis: Number of Contacts Added&lt;/p&gt;
+           &lt;/div&gt;
+           &lt;p className="text-xs text-gray-500 mt-2 italic"&gt;
+             Bars show monthly additions; cycles indicate bursts vs. lulls.
+           &lt;/p&gt;
+         &lt;/div&gt;
+       &lt;/div&gt;
+ 
+       &lt;div className="grid grid-cols-1 lg:grid-cols-3 gap-8 mb-8"&gt;
+         {/* Filter Panel */}
+         &lt;div className="lg:col-span-1"&gt;
+           &lt;div className="bg-white rounded-lg border border-gray-200 shadow-sm p-6"&gt;
+             &lt;h2 className="text-xl font-semibold text-[#305669] mb-4"&gt;
+               Filter Panel
+             &lt;/h2&gt;

+               &lt;div&gt;

+                   &lt;input

+                   /&gt;

+                   Event Type

+                   className="w-full px-3 py-2 border border-gray-300 rounded-md focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-[#8ABEB9]"
+                 &gt;
+                   &lt;option&gt;All&lt;/option&gt;

+           &lt;/div&gt;

+               /&gt;
+             &lt;/div&gt;
+             &lt;div className="overflow-x-auto"&gt;
+               &lt;table className="w-full"&gt;
+                 &lt;thead&gt;
+                   &lt;tr className="border-b border-gray-200"&gt;
+                     &lt;th className="text-left py-3 px-4 font-semibold text-[#305669] text-sm"&gt;Name&lt;/th&gt;
+                     &lt;th className="text-left py-3 px-4 font-semibold text-[#305669] text-sm"&gt;Company&lt;/th&gt;
+                     &lt;th className="text-left py-3 px-4 font-semibold text-[#305669] text-sm"&gt;Role&lt;/th&gt;
+                     &lt;th className="text-left py-3 px-4 font-semibold text-[#305669] text-sm"&gt;Date Added&lt;/th&gt;
+                     &lt;th className="text-left py-3 px-4 font-semibold text-[#305669] text-sm"&gt;Source&lt;/th&gt;
+                     &lt;th className="text-left py-3 px-4 font-semibold text-[#305669] text-sm"&gt;Notes&lt;/th&gt;
+                   &lt;/tr&gt;
+                 &lt;/thead&gt;
+                 &lt;tbody&gt;
+                   {filteredContacts.map((contact) =&gt; (
+                     &lt;tr key={contact.id} className="border-b border-gray-100 hover:bg-gray-50"&gt;
+                       &lt;td className="py-3 px-4 text-sm"&gt;{contact.name}&lt;/td&gt;
+                       &lt;td className="py-3 px-4 text-sm"&gt;{contact.company}&lt;/td&gt;
+                       &lt;td className="py-3 px-4 text-sm"&gt;{contact.role}&lt;/td&gt;
+                       &lt;td className="py-3 px-4 text-sm"&gt;{contact.dateAdded}&lt;/td&gt;
+                       &lt;td className="py-3 px-4 text-sm"&gt;{contact.source}&lt;/td&gt;
+                       &lt;td className="py-3 px-4"&gt;
+                         &lt;textarea
+                           value={notes[contact.id] || ''}
+                           onChange={(e) =&gt; updateNote(contact.id, e.target.value)}
+                           placeholder="Add note..."
+                           className="w-full px-2 py-1 border border-gray-300 rounded text-xs focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-[#8ABEB9] resize-none"
+                           rows={2}
+                         /&gt;
+                       &lt;/td&gt;
+                     &lt;/tr&gt;
+                   ))}
+                 &lt;/tbody&gt;
+               &lt;/table&gt;
+               {filteredContacts.length === 0 &amp;&amp; (
+                 &lt;p className="text-center text-gray-500 py-8"&gt;No contacts found&lt;/p&gt;
+               )}
+             &lt;/div&gt;
+           &lt;/div&gt;
+         &lt;/div&gt;
+       &lt;/div&gt;
+     &lt;/div&gt;
+   );
+ }
+ 
```

</details>

</tool-use>

## Completed features

### 1. **Navigation & Layout**
- Navigation bar with logo and menu items (My Timeline, Upload Contacts, View Chronicle)
- Mobile-responsive navigation
- Footer with "Week1 Sprint @Overclock Accelerator"
- Custom color scheme integrated (B7E5CD, 8ABEB9, 305669, C1785A)

### 2. **Page 1: My Timeline** (`/my-timeline`)
- Editable table with columns: Month/Year, Professional Event, Personal Event, Geographic Event
- Add/Delete row functionality
- "Confirm Timeline" button (logs to console for now)
- Card-based UI with Tailwind styling

### 3. **Page 2: Upload Contacts** (`/upload-contacts`)
- Drag-and-drop CSV file upload area
- Expected columns information panel
- Preview table showing first 10 rows of uploaded data
- Confirm/Cancel buttons (Confirm logs to console for now)
- CSV parsing with column detection

### 4. **Page 3: View Chronicle** (`/view-chronicle`)
- **Dashboard Cards**: Total Contacts, Avg/Month, Peak Month, High-Activity Months %
- **Bar Chart**: Visual representation of contacts added by month (last 5 years) using div-based bars
- **Filter Panel**: Date range, Event type, and Source dropdowns
- **Contacts Table**: Searchable table with Name, Company, Role, Date Added, Source, and Notes (editable per row)
- Mock data included for demonstration

### 5. **Home Page**
- Welcome page with links to all three main pages

## Technical details

- Next.js 16 with App Router
- TypeScript
- Tailwind CSS 4 with custom colors
- Mobile-responsive design
- Client-side state management (ready for Supabase integration later)

The development server is running. You can:
1. Visit `http://localhost:3000` to see the home page
2. Navigate to any of the three main pages using the navigation
3. Test all functionality (timeline editing, CSV upload, and chronicle viewing)

All pages are functional with local state management. When you're ready to connect to Supabase, the data structures are set up to make that integration straightforward.

---
